import React from 'react'; import { Container, Col, Nav, Tab, Row } from 'react-bootstrap'; export const Experience = () => { const education = [ "Certified Tech Developer, Digital House, Mercado Libre y Globant 2023", "Full Stack, Universidad Nacional de Cordoba - Mundos E, Bootcamp 2023", "Data Science, Digital House, Bootcamp 2022", "Ingeniería Civil Universidad Francisco de Paula Santander, Cúcuta 2020" ]; const courses = [ "Create a Custom Marketing Analytics Dashboard in Data Studio", "The Pytorch basics to start your ML projects", "Redes neuronales convolucionales con Keras", "AWS Academy Graduate - AWS Academy Cloud Foundations", "LinkedIn Learn", "Java: Programación orientada a objetos esencial", "TypeScript esencial", "Design Thinking: Inteligencia de datos", "Angular esencial", "React esencial" ]; const workExperience = [ "Data Scientist Noviembre-2023 - Marzo-2024 – Ofinow", "Data Scientist Agosto-2023 - Noviembre-2023 – Stradata AML" ]; return (
Estudios Profesionales Cursos Experiencia Laboral
    {education.map((item, index) => (
  • {item}
    • ))}
    {courses.map((item, index) => (
